title: Kobun

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game or when you become a Kobun, choose a Background:
1. Gang Member: When you perform the factional kill successfully two nights in a row, become Respected, causing your next attacks to attack a random visitor as well. If you fail to kill on a night, you lose Respected status.
2. Impoverished Youth: When you perform the factional kill, you steal one charge of your target's abilities and learn their role.
3. Family Ties: When you perform the factional kill, your visit is astral. Additionally, you poison whoever the target visits tonight.

desc:
Post 4096
*The Kobun, or "Foster Child", are the enforcers of the Yakuza, and are subservient to the Oyabun.*
